About this PortFolio

I have been aiming for a minimalistic webpage maximising the (js) effects.
Kaizen-minded and therefore passionate and burnout free.
Designed pages inspire and generate confidence even if the competition sells better quality customers tend to have confidence in the nicest looking site.
Design generates profit.

The full option site
Made with the framework I love using as much libraries as I can. Buttons changing thanks to Ternary Expressions.
Scrolling up or scrolling down
I believe, if you are scrolling towards the end, you are interested, the navbar appears. If you are scrolling in the other direction, you know where you are going, n
Well taught details
A smile in the background, a soft shadow, a thin white border, you must have noticed...
A side bar
Usefull information coded in that way you have the time to copy and paste.
Normal is for others
Thanks to the Material UI library customised to the colors of this site.
